cards.rules_text:
When The Elder Seal enters the battlefield, search your library for four nonland cards with different names, and reveal them. If four cards are revealed this way, exile them, then shuffle your library.
Whenever you cast a spell, put all cards exiled with The Elder Seal that share a name with that spell into your graveyard.
{T}: If exactly one card is exiled with The Elder Seal, cast that card without paying its mana cost if able.

Opponents can't cast spells as long as Elias Keiler, Ace Reporter is attacking.
{R}, Discard a card: Elias Keiler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{W}, Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Elias Keiler this turn.
At the beginning of each end step, draw a card for each card you've discarded this turn.

cards.special_text:

[+2]: Exile up to three cards that don't share a type from graveyards, then you gain 3 life and draw a card.
